changeSet.author: patrick_schmitz
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Pattern' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Attribute') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Pattern' AND "language"='en-US') ;

INSERT INTO language_translate("language", "translation", id) SELECT 'en-US' AS "language", 'Patterns' AS "translation", (SELECT id FROM language_source WHERE message='Attributes') AS id WHERE 0=(SELECT COUNT(id) FROM language_translate WHERE "translation"='Patterns' AND "language"='en-US') ;
changeSet.comment: Updates/new translations Used objects: language_translate Phabricator tasks: T259
